sentences.en: A sprayer hooked to a tractor can spray five gallons onto ten acres.
sentences.cn: 用拖拉机牵引的喷雾器可以将5加仑药水喷洒在10英亩田地上。

sentences.en: Anthrax have hooked up with Public Enemy for a metal/rap version of "Bring On The Noise"
sentences.cn: 炭疽乐队和公敌乐队联手合作了重金属加说唱版的歌曲《带来噪音》。

sentences.en: By merely letting drop one lighthearted remark, Miss Pao had Fang hooked.
sentences.cn: 鲍小姐只轻松一句话就把方鸿渐钩住了.

sentences.en: He hooked his arm round her neck and pulled her head down.
sentences.cn: 他一只胳膊钩在她的脖子上,把她的头拉低.

sentences.en: He reached up with a hooked pole to roll down the metal shutter.
sentences.cn: 他用带钩的杆子把金属护窗拉了下来。

sentences.en: He was thin and tall, with a hooked nose.
sentences.cn: 他又瘦又高，长着鹰钩鼻。

sentences.en: I first got hooked on scuba diving when I was twelve.
sentences.cn: 12岁时我开始迷上了带水肺潜水.

sentences.en: Many of the leaders have become hooked on power and money.
sentences.cn: 很多领导人都变得贪恋权力和金钱。

sentences.en: Paul hooked his tractor to the car and pulled it to safety.
sentences.cn: 保罗把自己的拖拉机挂在汽车上，然后把它拉到了安全的地方。

sentences.en: People who are truly hooked will go to any lengths to satisfy their craving for the drug.
sentences.cn: 真正吸毒成瘾的人为了满足毒瘾会不择手段.

sentences.en: Someone hooked five dollars from her.
sentences.cn: 有人从她那儿骗走五美元.

words.tran_cn: 钩状的；吸毒成瘾的；入迷的

phrases.tran_cn: 不择手段；用尽一切方法
挽住手臂；迷上，着迷（常用于被动语态）

trans.tran_cn: 钩状的，钩织成的，吸毒成瘾的，着了迷的
trans.tran_en: curved outwards or shaped like a hook
